ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming, and Why I Won't Pull in Dalnir
ygData.msgSnippet: I would recommend Pixie Strike over charm for use against casters in Dalnirs.  Keep the MR songs memmed for when you run up against two or three (which
ygData.messageBody:
<P>I would recommend Pixie Strike over charm for use
against casters in Dalnirs.  Keep the MR songs
memmed for when you run up against two or three (which
was pretty often as I remember)</P>
<P>I did make the mistake of going down to the next
lvl with a pick-up group.  Things went bad,
somebody said "gate" and suddenly I was alone
...  </P>
<P><STRONG><EM>Christopher Sanders
<christopher.sanders@...></EM></STRONG>
wrote: <BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid;
MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px"><TT>Fighting in
Dalnir yesterday, I noticed a couple things. 
First, for blues,<BR>they all resist my charm a
lot.  A LOT.  A smoldering goo resisted
8<BR>consecutive attempts at charming.  Others
would resist 3-5 times.  My<BR>charisma is over
125, and I don't have these troubles with charm
anywhere<BR>else.  The FM giants, the yellow and
evens, tend to resist 2 times, and then<BR>only
occassionally.  <BR><BR>The flip side, is the xp
in Dalnir.  Even in the hell level that is 30,
2<BR>kills gives noticable movement.  :) 
Just make sure you're in a good group,<BR>even with
Selos, the death run takes forever.<BR><BR>I won't
pull in Dalnir.  I think there must be a bard
hate multiplier in<BR>there.  Had a druid
pulling, and he brings 2 casters.  He turns the
corner,<BR>and 2 heartbeats later, they appear around
the corner, stop, and begin to<BR>cast.  Just
take a wild guess at the recipient of all that DD
loving.  :)<BR>Not the puller, oh no.  It
was the guy in blue who still had that weak,<BR>level
20 manasong going.  Full health to 2 bubbles
before we do any<BR>damage...heh.  Too bad for
them, the druid healed me.  I then proceeded
to<BR>buff everyones MR to high heck, and I don't
think they landed anything else.<BR><BR>But the second
one still resisted my charm like crazy...I'm
baffled.  Charm<BR>does not work in there like it
does everywhere else.  But I'm not leaving.<BR>As
long as you get a decent group...oh, the exp! 
Hehe...<BR><BR>Atonal<BR></TT><BR><!-- |**|begin egp
html banner|**| --><BR>
